reviewText: I love David Taylor's work, but the DVD was a disappointment.  Not much substance.
David's techniques are perfect examples of how to complete a quilt and make it shine. He is a master in the art quilt world.
Not enough information on this DVD.

David Taylor explains in great detail how he quilts his pictorial quilts.  He has good concise information, but his technique of rows of stitching that are 1/8" apart may be a bit to much for most quilters.  All in all a good training DVD that shows the importance of precise quality craftsmanship.

This video was very disappointing!  I expected to learn something, but most of what he said was practice, practice practice.  He spent a lot of wasted time, not teaching.  Would not buy another of his videos.
